You can transfer your points to airline miles in blocks only (UOB: 5000 UNI$ = 10000 miles  HSBC: 25000 pts = 10000 miles). E.g you have 4999 UNI$  you cannot convert it to miles.

If you don‚Äôt get the uni$ in those blocks  then the bank points can‚Äôt be converted in fractional miles.But the reply you quoted was more on the mechanics of how most miles card works. Bank issues points  you convert those points to airline miles (in blocks). Bank points and miles have their own expiry dates. Some bank cards auto converts and pushes to airline miles
